maqras.text: 56|2|geugeos-i oneun geos-e daehayeo eo neu nugudo geojis-ila haji moshamyeo
56|3|eotteon mulineun gul-yog-eul bad-eul geos-i yo eotteon mulineun chan-yang-eul bad-eulila
56|8|geu jung hananeun upyeon-ui donglyoga doel geos-ila neohuineun upyeon-ui donglyoga mueos-inji aneunyo
56|9|geuligo jwapyeon-ui donglyoga doel geos ila neohuineun jwapyeon-ui donglyoga mueos inji aneunyo
56|10|apseoneun jaga doel geos-ila neo huineun apseoneun ja-e daehayeo aneunyo
56|18|suljangwa jujeonjawa kkaekkeushan mul geuligo gadeugchan jandeullo bongsahadeola
56|19|geugeos-eulo geudeul-eun dutong-eul alh jido chwihajido anihamyeo
56|25|geudeul-eun geugos-eseo mu-ighago yogdoen maldeul-eul deudji anihamyeo
56|27|upyeon-ui donglyoga issnani neohui neun upyeon-ui donglyoe daehayeo aneunyo
56|28|geudeul-eun gasiga eobsneun sideula namu gaunde iss-eul geos-imyeo
56|29|song-isong-i yeolmae maejhin ttalha na mu gaunde issnola
56|35|hananim-eun geudeul-eul wihae saelo un baeujadeul-eul dusigo
56|41|jwapyeon-ui donglyoga issnani neohuineunjwapyeon-ui donglyoga mueos-inji aneunyo
56|42|geudeul-eun jag-yeolhaneun boljioggwa deulkkeulhneun mulsog-e issge doego
56|47|jug-eo heulg-idoeeo ppyeoman namneun u liga dasi buhwalhandan mal-inyo lago malhayeossdeola
56|48|uli seonjodeuldo geuleohdan mal-i yo lago malhaessdeola
56|49|illeogalodoe geuleohanila yes seonjodeuldo geuligo huse-ui salamdeuldo
56|50|moduga jal allyeojin eotteon nal sangbong-eul wihayeo dagat-i moini
56|55|galjeung-e heodeog-ineun nagtaga ma sineun geosgwa gatdeola
56|56|geuleoham-i geudeul-i bad-eul bosang ui nal daejeob-ila
56|57|hananim-i neohuileul changjohayeoss-eu doe neohuineun geu jinlileul mid-eulyeo haji anhneunyo
56|59|geugeos-eun neohuiga changjohan geos-inyoanimyeon hananim-i changjohan geos-inyo
56|60|hananim-eun neohui gaunde nugu egelado jug-eum-eul ileuge hal su iss eudoe jwajeolhaji anihamyeo
56|61|neohuiui yangsang-eul bakkueo neohui ga alji moshaneun yangsang-eulo neohuileul jaechangjo hasinila
56|62|neohuineun choechoui changjoleul algo iss-eumyeonseo geugeos-eul gyohun-eulo samji anhneunyo
56|63|neohuiga ttang-e simneun ssias-eul bo ji ani haessneunyo
56|64|neohuiga geugeos-eul jalage haneu nyo animyeon hananim-i seongjangke haneu nyo
56|65|hananim-i wonhandamyeon geubun-eun geugeos-eul sansanjogag-eulo mandeusinila geuttae neohuineun bitan-e ppajimyeo
56|69|neohuiga bileul naelige haneunyo animyeon hananim-i bileul naelige ha neunyo
56|70|hananim-i wonhaessdamyeon geubun-eun geugeos-eul jjage hasyeoss-eulila geulaedo neohuineun gamsahalyeo haji anhneunyo
56|72|bul-eul kyeogiwihae namuleul sim-eun jaga neohuiinyo animyeon hananim-i geugeos-eul seongjangke haneunyo
56|73|hananim-eun geugeos-eulo gyohun-i doege hayeossgo yeohaengjadeul-ege yuyong hadolog hayeossnola
56|74|geuleomeulo widaehan geudae junim ui ileum-eulo chanmihala
